an6.19:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:  "bhikkhavo"ti.
an6.19:2: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahaṁ kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:3: Aññataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahampi kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:4: Aññataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahampi kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:5: Aññataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahampi kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:6: Aññataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahampi kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:7: Aññataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:  "ahampi kho, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin"ti.
an6.19:8: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.19:9: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:  ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.(2)
an6.19:10: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:  ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.(3)
an6.19:11: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:  ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.(4)
an6.19:12: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pamattā viharanti dandhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya. (1–4.)
an6.19:13: Yo ca khvāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:  ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.(5)
an6.19:14: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:  ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.(6)
an6.19:15: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū appamattā viharanti tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya. (5–6.)
an6.19:16: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:  ‘appamattā viharissāma, tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāvessāma āsavānaṁ khayāyā’ti. Evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabban"ti.
